text: Tumi laksya karaa na'ine ye, akasasamuha arau prthiraita yisakala ache te'omloke arau saraibad'dhabharae uraiphuraa caraa'iye'o allahara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karae? Pratyeke'i jane nija nija ibadatara arau paraitrata-mahima ghosanara pad'dhati. Arau sihamte yi karae se'i bisaye allaha samyaka aragata
